titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the United States or any state from denying or abridging: (1) equality of rights under the law on account of sex; or (2) reproductive rights for women.
